com.openkm.module

接口 DocumentModule

  • 所有已知实现类:
    DbDocumentModule, JcrDocumentModule, OKMDocument

    public interface DocumentModule

      Copy a document to another location in the repository.

      Creates a new document in the repository.

      Deletes a document from the repository.

      Force to cancel a previous checked out state in a document.

    • 方法详细资料

      • create

        Document create(java.lang.String token,
              Document doc,
              java.io.InputStream is)
                throws UnsupportedMimeTypeException,
                       FileSizeExceededException,
                       UserQuotaExceededException,
                       VirusDetectedException,
                       ItemExistsException,
                       PathNotFoundException,
                       AccessDeniedException,
                       RepositoryException,
                       java.io.IOException,
                       DatabaseException,
                       ExtensionException,
                       AutomationException
        Creates a new document in the repository.
        参数:
        doc - A document object with the new document properties.
        content - The document content in bytes.
        返回:
        A document object with the properties of the new created document.
        抛出:
        UnsupportedMimeTypeException - If the uploaded file has an unsupported MIME type.
        FileSizeExceededException - If the document content is biggest than the maximum accepted.
        PathNotFoundException - If the parent folder doesn't exist.
        ItemExistsException - If there is already a document in the repository with the same name.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the parent document folder because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        java.io.IOException - An error when inserting document data into the repository.
        UserQuotaExceededException
        VirusDetectedException
        DatabaseException
        ExtensionException
        AutomationException

      • delete

        void delete(java.lang.String token,
          java.lang.String docPath)
            throws LockException,
                   PathNotFoundException,
                   AccessDeniedException,
                   RepositoryException,
                   DatabaseException,
                   ExtensionException
        Deletes a document from the repository. It is a logical delete, so really is moved to the user trash and can be restored.
        参数:
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        抛出:
        LockException - Can't delete a locked document.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException
        ExtensionException

      • rename

        Document rename(java.lang.String token,
              java.lang.String docPath,
              java.lang.String newName)
                throws PathNotFoundException,
                       ItemExistsException,
                       AccessDeniedException,
                       LockException,
                       RepositoryException,
                       DatabaseException,
                       ExtensionException
        Rename a document in the repository.
        参数:
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        newName - The new folder name.
        返回:
        An document object with the new document properties.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        ItemExistsException - If there is already a document in the repository with the same name in the same path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        LockException
        DatabaseException
        ExtensionException

      • getProperties

        Document getProperties(java.lang.String token,
                     java.lang.String docPath)
                       throws PathNotFoundException,
                              RepositoryException,
                              DatabaseException
        Obtain document properties from the repository.
        参数:
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        返回:
        The document properties.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path. you can't modify the document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • setProperties

        void setProperties(java.lang.String token,
                 Document doc)
                   throws VersionException,
                          LockException,
                          PathNotFoundException,
                          AccessDeniedException,
                          RepositoryException,
                          DatabaseException
        Set document properties in the repository.
        参数:
        doc - An document object with the properties
        抛出:
        VersionException - A document checked in can't be modified.
        LockException - A locked document can't be modified.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • getContent

        java.io.InputStream getContent(java.lang.String token,
                             java.lang.String docPath,
                             boolean checkout)
                               throws PathNotFoundException,
                                      AccessDeniedException,
                                      RepositoryException,
                                      java.io.IOException,
                                      DatabaseException
        Obtain document content from the repository.
        参数:
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        返回:
        The content of the document file.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify this document because of lack of permissions. Related to extended security.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        java.io.IOException - An error when retrieving document data from the repository.
        DatabaseException

      • getContentByVersion

        java.io.InputStream getContentByVersion(java.lang.String token,
                                      java.lang.String docPath,
                                      java.lang.String versionId)
                                        throws RepositoryException,
                                               PathNotFoundException,
                                               java.io.IOException,
                                               DatabaseException
        Obtain document content from the repository.
        参数:
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        versionId - The id of the version to get the content from.
        返回:
        The content of the document file.
        抛出:
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify this document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no folder in the repository with this path.
        java.io.IOException - An error when retrieving document data from the repository.
        DatabaseException

      • getChilds

        @Deprecated
java.util.List<Document> getChilds(java.lang.String token,
                                            java.lang.String fldPath)
                                   throws PathNotFoundException,
                                          RepositoryException,
                                          DatabaseException
        已过时。 
        Retrieve a list of child documents from an existing folder.
        参数:
        fldPath - The path that identifies an unique folder.
        返回:
        A Collection with the child documents.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no folder in this repository path.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

        java.util.List<Document> getChildren(java.lang.String token,
                                   java.lang.String fldPath)
                                     throws PathNotFoundException,
                                            RepositoryException,
                                            DatabaseException
        Retrieve a list of children documents from an existing folder.
        参数:
        fldPath - The path that identifies an unique folder.
        返回:
        A Collection with the child documents.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no folder in this repository path.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • checkout

        void checkout(java.lang.String token,
            java.lang.String docPath)
              throws LockException,
                     PathNotFoundException,
                     AccessDeniedException,
                     RepositoryException,
                     DatabaseException
        Checkout the document to edit it. The document can't be edited by another user until it is checked in o the checkout is canceled.
        参数:
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        抛出:
        LockException - A locked document can't be modified.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • cancelCheckout

        void cancelCheckout(java.lang.String token,
                  java.lang.String docPath)
                    throws LockException,
                           PathNotFoundException,
                           AccessDeniedException,
                           RepositoryException,
                           DatabaseException
        Cancel a previous checked out state in a document.
        参数:
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        抛出:
        LockException - A locked document can't be modified.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • forceCancelCheckout

        void forceCancelCheckout(java.lang.String token,
                       java.lang.String docPath)
                         throws LockException,
                                PathNotFoundException,
                                AccessDeniedException,
                                RepositoryException,
                                DatabaseException,
                                PrincipalAdapterException
        Force to cancel a previous checked out state in a document.
        参数:
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        抛出:
        LockException - A locked document can't be modified.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException
        PrincipalAdapterException

      • isCheckedOut

        boolean isCheckedOut(java.lang.String token,
                   java.lang.String docPath)
                     throws PathNotFoundException,
                            RepositoryException,
                            DatabaseException
        Test if a node has been already checked out.
        参数:
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        返回:
        True if the document is in checked out state, or false if not.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • checkin

        Version checkin(java.lang.String token,
              java.lang.String docPath,
              java.io.InputStream is,
              java.lang.String comment)
                throws FileSizeExceededException,
                       UserQuotaExceededException,
                       VirusDetectedException,
                       LockException,
                       VersionException,
                       PathNotFoundException,
                       AccessDeniedException,
                       RepositoryException,
                       java.io.IOException,
                       DatabaseException,
                       ExtensionException
        Check in the document to create a new version.
        参数:
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        comment - A comment for this checkin.
        返回:
        A version object with the properties of the new generated version.
        抛出:
        LockException - A locked document can't be modified.
        VersionException - If the nodes was not previously checked out.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        FileSizeExceededException
        UserQuotaExceededException
        VirusDetectedException
        java.io.IOException
        DatabaseException
        ExtensionException

      • getVersionHistory

        java.util.List<Version> getVersionHistory(java.lang.String token,
                                        java.lang.String docPath)
                                          throws PathNotFoundException,
                                                 RepositoryException,
                                                 DatabaseException
        Get the document version history.
        参数:
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        返回:
        A Collection of Versions with every document version.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • lock

        LockInfo lock(java.lang.String token,
            java.lang.String docPath)
              throws LockException,
                     PathNotFoundException,
                     AccessDeniedException,
                     RepositoryException,
                     DatabaseException
        Lock a document, so only is editable by the locker.
        参数:
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        抛出:
        LockException - If the node is already locked.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • unlock

        void unlock(java.lang.String token,
          java.lang.String docPath)
            throws LockException,
                   PathNotFoundException,
                   AccessDeniedException,
                   RepositoryException,
                   DatabaseException
        Unlock a document, so will be editable for other users.
        参数:
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        抛出:
        LockException - If the node is not locked.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • forceUnlock

        void forceUnlock(java.lang.String token,
               java.lang.String docPath)
                 throws LockException,
                        PathNotFoundException,
                        AccessDeniedException,
                        RepositoryException,
                        DatabaseException,
                        PrincipalAdapterException
        For document unlock, so will be editable for other users. This action need to be perfomed by and administrator.
        参数:
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        抛出:
        LockException - If the node is not locked.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException
        PrincipalAdapterException

      • isLocked

        boolean isLocked(java.lang.String token,
               java.lang.String docPath)
                 throws RepositoryException,
                        PathNotFoundException,
                        DatabaseException
        Tell if a document is locked.
        参数:
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        返回:
        True if the document is locked, and False otherwise.
        抛出:
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't access this document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any repository problem.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in the repository with this path.
        DatabaseException

      • getLockInfo

        LockInfo getLockInfo(java.lang.String token,
                   java.lang.String docPath)
                     throws RepositoryException,
                            PathNotFoundException,
                            LockException,
                            DatabaseException
        Returns a lock information.
        参数:
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        返回:
        The lock info.
        抛出:
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't access this document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any repository problem.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in the repository with this path.
        LockException - If the node is not locked.
        DatabaseException

      • purge

        void purge(java.lang.String token,
         java.lang.String docPath)
           throws LockException,
                  AccessDeniedException,
                  RepositoryException,
                  PathNotFoundException,
                  DatabaseException,
                  ExtensionException
        Deletes definitively a document from the repository. It is a physical delete, so the document can't be restored.
        参数:
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        抛出:
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't access this document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in the repository with this path.
        LockException
        DatabaseException
        ExtensionException

      • move

        void move(java.lang.String token,
        java.lang.String docPath,
        java.lang.String fldPath)
          throws PathNotFoundException,
                 ItemExistsException,
                 AccessDeniedException,
                 LockException,
                 RepositoryException,
                 DatabaseException,
                 ExtensionException,
                 AutomationException
        Move a document to another location in the repository.
        参数:
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        fldPath - The destination folder path.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If the dstPath does not exists
        ItemExistsException - If there is already a document in the destination folder with the same name.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the document's parent folder or the destination folder because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        LockException
        DatabaseException
        ExtensionException
        AutomationException

      • copy

        void copy(java.lang.String token,
        java.lang.String docPath,
        java.lang.String dstPath)
          throws ItemExistsException,
                 PathNotFoundException,
                 AccessDeniedException,
                 RepositoryException,
                 java.io.IOException,
                 DatabaseException,
                 UserQuotaExceededException,
                 ExtensionException,
                 AutomationException
        Copy a document to another location in the repository.
        参数:
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        dstPath - The destination folder path.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If the dstPath does not exists
        ItemExistsException - If there is already a document in the destination folder with the same name.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the document's parent folder or the destination folder because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        java.io.IOException
        DatabaseException
        UserQuotaExceededException
        ExtensionException
        AutomationException

      • restoreVersion

        void restoreVersion(java.lang.String token,
                  java.lang.String docPath,
                  java.lang.String versionId)
                    throws PathNotFoundException,
                           AccessDeniedException,
                           LockException,
                           RepositoryException,
                           DatabaseException,
                           ExtensionException
        Revert the document to an specific previous version.
        参数:
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        versionId - The version id to revert to.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        LockException
        DatabaseException
        ExtensionException

      • purgeVersionHistory

        void purgeVersionHistory(java.lang.String token,
                       java.lang.String docPath)
                         throws AccessDeniedException,
                                PathNotFoundException,
                                LockException,
                                RepositoryException,
                                DatabaseException
        Purge a Document version history, so delete all previous versions but last one. Used to free Document version size.
        参数:
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        抛出:
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't access this folder because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no folder in the repository with this path.
        LockException
        DatabaseException

      • getVersionHistorySize

        long getVersionHistorySize(java.lang.String token,
                         java.lang.String docPath)
                           throws RepositoryException,
                                  PathNotFoundException,
                                  DatabaseException
        Get the version size of a Document.
        参数:
        docPath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        抛出:
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't access this folder because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no folder in the repository with this path.
        DatabaseException

      • isValid

        boolean isValid(java.lang.String token,
              java.lang.String docId)
                throws PathNotFoundException,
                       RepositoryException,
                       DatabaseException
        Test if a document path is valid.
        参数:
        docId - The path that identifies an unique document or its UUID.
        返回:
        True if is a valid document path, otherwise false.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If the node does not exists.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • getPath

        java.lang.String getPath(java.lang.String token,
                       java.lang.String uuid)
                         throws AccessDeniedException,
                                RepositoryException,
                                DatabaseException
        Get the document path from a UUID
        参数:
        uuid - The unique document id.
        返回:
        The document path
        抛出:
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't access this node because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any problem.
        DatabaseException
